resources.string: &appname; let\'s you track your whereabouts in the background. For that you don\'t even need GPS!
First, you should define custom Zones which mark the areas you want to track. For each Zone you enter a name and an area on the map.

You\'re already ready to go! After starting the background tracking, entries will pop up in the Overview as you enter and leave previously defined Zones.\n\nYou can have a detailed look at the measurements on the Live Map.
Don\'t forget to personalize your experience in the Settings and to check out the Statistics.\n\nHave fun!
